Detailed Description

An object that encapsulates sorintg and rendering non-opaque polys.

The purpose of this object is to store all non-Opaque polys in the scene, sort them back to front, and then render them. DzScene will create an instance of this object as needed and set the m_nonOpaqueSorter member in DzDrawStyle when nodes need to send non-opaque polys to this class rather than draw them.

void DzPolySorter::addPolygons ( const DzFacetMesh *  mesh,
const DzFaceGroup *  faces,
const DzMaterial *  mat 
)

Adds polygons to the current sort operation. This is called by DzObject in place of drawing non-opaque polys.

Parameters:
mesh The mesh to add polygons from
faces The faces to add
mat The materials for the polygons
void DzPolySorter::doSort ( const DzVec3 &  viewpoint  ) 

Sort all polys that have been added via addPolygons() from the position given by viewpoint in back-to-front (far-to-near) order.

Parameters:
viewpoint The position to sort the polys from
void DzPolySorter::draw ( const DzDrawStyle &  style  ) 

Draws the sorted polys to the current OpenGL context.

Parameters:
style The draw style to use
